profile_summary:
As a Software Engineer specializing in Artificial Intelligence, I bring 8 years of experience in developing high-performance solutions leveraging advanced technologies. My core areas of expertise include **Azure** services such as **App Services**, **Cosmos DB**, and **Key Vault**, as well as building APIs that seamlessly integrate with **Generative AI** and **LLMs**. I have a profound understanding of **speech-to-text** technologies and have successfully implemented **Intelligent Document Processing** solutions.

I possess a strong foundation in full-stack development, utilizing frameworks and tools like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, alongside key cloud services on **AWS**. My experience encompasses leading the development of enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities, enabling predictive analytics and intelligent automation. I am well-versed in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring that the applications I build are robust, secure, and compliant with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I am skilled in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
